message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on a one-of-a-kind item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this unique item. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $11000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness. I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.

I've considered Alice's latest offer, and while I understand the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10500. This seems to be a reasonable price given the current market conditions.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. After re-evaluating the market conditions, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $11500. This is a compromise that I believe reflects the product's value and your willingness to negotiate. I'm open to further discussion.

Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. Considering the product's unique nature and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $11000. I hope this aligns better with what you're willing to accept.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. After careful consideration, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $11200. This is a slight compromise, but I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and your willingness to negotiate. I'm open to further discussion.
